hero.heading: Mein kampf berliner
hero.subheading: We rescue, rehabilitate, and rehome cats in Bangalore, connecting them with families who will love them forever.
hero.sideText: Your text here - no heading, just a paragraph or two that provides additional context or information.

points.title: Systematic vetting
points.description: Every adopter goes through our careful review process to ensure the best match for both cat and family.

points.title: Lifelong support
points.description: We're here for you after adoption with advice, resources, and a community of cat lovers.

points.title: No fees, pure love
points.description: We never charge adoption fees. Our only goal is finding loving homes for every cat.
